name: Dragonfate - Demo
description:
Dragonfate is a fantasy visual novel set in a world far from our own. Fey creatures hide away in corners of this world, ever fearful of human discovery.

Support the game on Kickstarter!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/copperleafgames/dragonfate-visual-novel

The dragons of the fey are noble and brave creatures, though they have lost the peace they once held centuries ago. Their separate kingdoms are in constant conflict. When news spreads of a long-lost dragon princess being discovered in a human settlement, the dragon kingdoms vow to put their differences aside in order to stage a rescue mission.

Guide the lost princess of fire dragons home and make decisions that will affect the outcome of her story. Influence her relationships and her impact on the world around her. Will you lead her to happiness, or set her on a path of chaos?
